title: Blank check
creator_credit: Rupert Wainwright, Gary Adelson, Craig Baumgarten and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: When 11-year-old Preston Waters’ bicycle is hit by a crook on the run, a hastily scrawled blank cheque sets the wheels in motion for the spending spree of a lifetime. Cast includes Brian Bonsall, Karen Duffy, Miguel Ferrer.
creator_credit_for_label: Rupert Wainwright, Gary Adelson, Craig Baumgarten and Walt Disney Productions
